üìÑ End User License Agreement (EULA) by MKSR PROJECT

1. Usage
You are allowed to use the launcher for running Minecraft free of charge. Modifying the code or redistributing the launcher without written permission from the MKSR project owner is prohibited.

2. Liability
The MKSR project owner is not responsible for any issues that may arise from using the launcher, including data loss or account bans.

3. Prohibited:
Using the launcher to hack the game or deceive other players.

Distributing viruses or malicious software through the launcher.

Selling the launcher or any of its parts.

4. Changes
The MKSR project owner reserves the right to modify the terms of this agreement at any time. The latest version will always be available when launching the launcher.
